alert.note: Alert for Eastern Curry County and Josephine County; Eastern Douglas County Foothills; Jackson County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 5:50PM PST until January 07 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST THIS EVENING ABOVE 2500 FEET... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST SUNDAY ABOVE 2000 FEET... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning above 2500 feet, heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. For the Winter Weather Advisory above 2000 feet, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches through Sunday morning. * WHERE...The warning area includes elevations above 2500 feet in eastern Curry, Josephine, eastern Douglas and Jackson Counties including Butte Falls, Toketee Falls and portions of highways 140, 62 and 138. The advisory area includes elevations above 2000 feet in eastern Curry, Josephine, eastern Douglas and Jackson Counties including the city of Ashland, the lower I-5 passes of Sexton Summit and Canyon Mountain and portions of highways 140, 62, 138, and 238. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 7 PM PST this evening. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 10 AM PST Sunday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels may lower to 1500 feet late tonight and early Sunday morning with light snow of generally less than an inch down to lower valley floors. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and low visibilities due to snow and blowing snow. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: * Travel is strongly discouraged because of dangerous conditions. Do not detour during winter storms. * If you must travel, keep tire chains, a flashlight, blankets, food, water, medications, and a fully charged phone with you. * The safest place during a winter storm is indoors.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Curry County and Josephine County; Eastern Douglas County Foothills; Jackson County
